author: Joseph Hernandez
title: Chicago restaurants donate food to lawyers advocating for O’Hare detainees - Chicago Tribune
text:
Chicago restaurants donate food to lawyers advocating for O’Hare detainees Helping at O'Hare 
Attorneys work in Terminal 5 of O'Hare International Airport on Monday, Jan. 30, 2017. 
Attorneys work in Terminal 5 of O'Hare International Airport on Monday, Jan. 30, 2017. (Nuccio DiNuzzo / Chicago Tribune) Joseph Hernandez 
First, we found the best hot chocolate in Chicago . Now, we track down the city's best chocolate cake, from chocolate tres leches cake to 23-layer insanity. 
Restaurant critic Phil Vettel and colleagues reflect on the best dishes and drinks they had in Chicago restaurants and bars this year.
